name: api_utility_QualitySettings
description: This represents the script interface for Quality Settings.

properties.name: hideFlags
properties.description: Should the object be hidden, saved with the Scene or modifiable by the user?

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the object.

properties.name: GetInstanceID
properties.description: Gets the instance ID of the object.

properties.name: ToString
properties.description: Returns the name of the object.

properties.name: DecreaseLevel
properties.description: Decrease the current quality level.

properties.name: ForEach
properties.description: Executes the given Action for each Quality Level configured in QualitySettings.

properties.name: GetActiveQualityLevelsForPlatform
properties.description: [Editor Only] Obtains an array with the Quality Level indexes that are selected for the given platform.

properties.name: GetActiveQualityLevelsForPlatformCount
properties.description: [Editor Only] Obtains the number of Quality Levels that are selected for a given platform.

properties.name: GetAllRenderPipelineAssetsForPlatform
properties.description: [Editor Only] Fills the given list with all the Render Pipeline Assets on any Quality Level for the given platform. Without filtering by Render Pipeline Asset type or null.

properties.name: GetQualityLevel
properties.description: Returns the current graphics quality level.

properties.name: GetQualitySettings
properties.description: Provides a reference to the QualitySettings object.

properties.name: GetRenderPipelineAssetAt
properties.description: Provides a reference to the RenderPipelineAsset that defines the override render pipeline for a given quality level.

properties.name: GetRenderPipelineAssetsForPlatform
properties.description: [Editor Only] Obtains a set with the non null Render Pipeline Assets selected on all the Quality Levels for the given platform.

properties.name: GetTextureMipmapLimitSettings
properties.description: Retrieves a copy of the TextureMipmapLimitSettings from a texture mipmap limit group.

properties.name: IncreaseLevel
properties.description: Increase the current quality level.

properties.name: IsPlatformIncluded
properties.description: [Editor Only] Returns if the given platform is included by the Quality Level.

properties.name: SetLODSettings
properties.description: Sets the lodBias and maximumLODLevel at the same time.

properties.name: SetQualityLevel
properties.description: Sets a new graphics quality level.

properties.name: SetTextureMipmapLimitSettings
properties.description: Applies new TextureMipmapLimitSettings to the indicated texture mipmap limit group.

properties.name: TryExcludePlatformAt
properties.description: [Editor Only] Excludes a platform for the given Quality Level.
